TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlParseException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: Represents the exception class for parser-specific exceptions from a WPF XAML parser.

span.span: Represents the exception class for parser-specific exceptions from a WPF XAML parser.

summary.span: This exception is used in XAML API or WPF XAML parser operations from .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5, or for specific use of the WPF XAML parser by calling API.

span.span: This exception is used in XAML API or WPF XAML parser operations from .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5, or for specific use of the WPF XAML parser by calling API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅用于为 WPF 应用程序执行解析 / 加载 XAML 的 WPF 实现 XAML 分析器。 is used only for the WPF-implemented XAML parser that performs the XAML parsing and loading for WPF applications. 具体而言，例外情况是仅当应用程序的目标时才可用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。Specifically, the exception is only relevant when an application targets [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 异常也可来自对挂钩 WPF 实现 XAML 分析器从 XAML 加载内运行的 WPF 应用程序的 Api 调用，运行时中的用户代码 (例如，调用)。The exception can also originate from user code in run-time calls to APIs that hook up the WPF-implemented XAML parser to load XAML from within a running WPF application (for example, calls to ). 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、通常报告 XAML 处理异常的异常在不同的命名空间中定义 () 和不同的程序集 (System.Xaml)。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the exception that typically reports XAML processing exceptions is defined in a different namespace () and a different assembly (System.Xaml). 除非你对 WPF XAML 分析器撰写等效项或使用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]目标，你通常将不会引发从你自己的代码。Unless you are writing an equivalent to the WPF XAML parser or working with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] targeting, you generally will not throw from your own code. 但是，异常处理有时是必需的。However, handling for the exception is sometimes necessary. 对于应用程序方案，其中你可能想要禁止显示 XAML 分析错误， 应用程序级别的事件处理程序是一种方法来处理运行时。For application scenarios, where you may want to suppress XAML parse errors, a event handler at the application level is one way to handle a run-time . 是否要取消显示异常或让他们表面到用户代码取决于如何设计应用程序以加载 XAML，并加载你的应用程序将其分配到使用 XAML 的信任级别。Whether to suppress exceptions or let them surface to user code depends on how you design your application for purposes of loading XAML, and the trust level that you assign to the XAML your application loads. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md)或"XAML 安全性"部分[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Security Considerations](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md) or "XAML Security" section of [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). 应用程序的页时是引发，通常是在上下文中`InitializeComponent`进行页面类，这是 WPF XAML 分析器在每个页级别的 WPF 应用程序模型的使用情况的入口点调用。For pages of an application, when the is thrown, it is usually in the context of the `InitializeComponent` call made by your page class, which is the entry point for the WPF application model's usage of the WPF XAML parser at the per-page level. 处理策略的另一种可能是将因此`try/catch`块以`InitializeComponent`。Therefore another possible handling strategy is to place `try/catch` blocks in `InitializeComponent`. 但是，此技术未与模板，可视化设计图面很好地集成和其他生成向上源该挂钩`InitializeComponent`。However, this technique does not integrate well with templates, visual design surfaces and other generated sources that hook up `InitializeComponent`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封送此类型的异常处理跨应用程序域或计算机边界时，将进行序列化使用此构造函数。This constructor is used for serialization when marshaling an exception of this type across an application domain or machine boundary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于前一个异常而直接导致引发的异常，应包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于前一个异常而直接导致引发的异常，应包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

public: property Uri ^ BaseUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets base URI information when the exception is thrown.

span.span: Gets base URI information when the exception is thrown.

value.span: 分析器上下文的基 URI。

span.span: The parser context base URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本 URI 因或许可以分析器上下文时出现异常。Base URI is potentially available because of parser context when the exception occurred. 了解基 URI 可以是可用于调试的情况下，资源解析错误的根本原因。Knowing the base URI can be useful for debugging cases where a resource resolution error is the underlying cause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据的对象。 sets a object with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 反序列化期间，从通过流传输的 重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream.
